conversation.speaker: USER

conversation.text: Interstellar, with its stunning visuals and a cast led by Matthew McConaughey, is definitely worth watching if you enjoyed the sci-fi genre. Another film I'd recommend is Blade Runner 2049, which offers a thought-provoking exploration of artificial intelligence and humanity, starring Ryan Gosling and Harrison Ford. Both movies offer a blend of action and drama set in captivating futuristic landscapes. Enjoy your cinematic journey!
